headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Realty Income (O) After Its Recent Share Price Rally
summary: If you are wondering whether Realty Income is still reasonably priced after its recent run, you are not alone. This article is built to help you size up its current valuation with confidence. With the share price at US$66.60 and recent returns of 1.7% over 7 days, 9.3% over 30 days, 16.2% year to date and 25.0% over 1 year, many investors are asking what that means for future upside and risk. Recent news around Realty Income has focused on its position as a large, diversified net lease REIT...
